name: bollock
content:
[ C usually plural ] a rude word for a
testicle bollocks
[ U ] a rude word for nonsense: That's a load of bollocks.
See more
[ T ] a rude word meaning to speak angrily to someone because they have done something wrong: He got bollocked by the boss. The teacher used to bollock me for talking in class. Related word
bollocking Phrasal verb
bollocks something up
